collection:
This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal
information.

By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of
information in accordance with this policy.

### Information We Collect

#### Personal Information

When you register and use our service, we collect the following personal
information:

  * Email address
  * Password

#### Content Information

We also collect the description and content you provide for the slides.

We also use cookies and third-party tracking
technologies to measure application reach and performance.
sharing:
We use the description and
content provided for slides to generate slides using third-party API
providers.

### Third-Party Sharing

We share the description and content associated with slides with third-party
API providers for the purpose of generating slide content.
